list.name: MTI Calcutta
list.notes: designed to easily adjust to chest sizes ranging from 30 inches to 56 inches utilizing 7 adjustment points.

list.name: MTI Fisher SE
list.notes: This is the original MTI jacket outfited specifically for fishing, with new features.

list.name: MTI Solaris
list.notes: All the comfort of the popular Solaris mesh back jacket, plus 'Fishing Specification' outfitting. The new Fishing Bridge is a pocket/rigid platform designed to open and provide a handy work surface, such as tying on lures.

list.name: NRS Chinook
list.notes: Pockets on pockets, lots of gear attachment points, plus flotation if you swim -- what's not to like about the NRS Chinook Life Jacket?

list.name: Stohlquist Fisherman
list.notes: The Fisherman provides excellent cockpit management with places for the little things that could end up in your seator overboard. Dual front-mounted tool pouch pockets have protective EVA stiffened outer shells to protect pocket contents, and act as fold down workstations.

list.name: Crewsaver Teviot Auto
list.notes: Inflation occurs automatically when the capsule is immersed.Capsule fires within 5 seconds of entry into water.Can also be inflated as manual version.

list.name: Ronny Fisher
list.notes: Utilizes Astral’s proprietary ThinVent™ technology that includes a super thin foam that is evenly distributed in the back and ventilated for maximum comfort in hot weather.

list.name: Nookie Ranger II
list.notes: Expandable zipped neoprene front & back pockets.Large back pocket (takes hydration system) with extra mesh pocket for flares etc..

list.name: Palm Hydro Adventure
list.notes: Traditional foam template covers chest and back, YKK front zip entry
